explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the use of supervised machine learning (SML) methods to model muscle fatigue.
explanations.supervised learning: The study uses supervised machine learning (SML) based on classification to model muscle fatigue.
explanations.classification: The paper states that six categories (24 methods) of supervised machine learning based on classification were selected for the study.
explanations.support vector machine: The best-fitted models were obtained using support vector machine methods, as mentioned in the results section.
explanations.SVM: SVM is an abbreviation for support vector machine, which was used in the study to obtain the best-fitted models.
